execution_quality: The agent provided no structured advice or analysis; the user had to propose their own solution without agent input.
work_category: Architectural consultation on organizing multi-language SDK port repositories.
summary: The agent made no tool calls and provided no visible guidance, prompting the user to self-generate a solution and then seek additional information about repository organization features. This represents a missed opportunity to provide architectural guidance before the user settled on their own approach.
follow_up_pattern: User proposed their own directory structure and then asked a follow-up question about GitHub/GitLab grouping features.
